mapper.select: SELECT STRING_VALUE, INT_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, DOUBLE_VALUE, BIG_DECIMAL_VALUE, DATE_VALUE, TIME_VALUE, DATETIME_VALUE, BYTES_VALUE FROM TB_TEST_DATA_TYPE
SELECT ID, STRING_VALUE, INT_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, DOUBLE_VALUE, BIG_DECIMAL_VALUE, DATE_VALUE, TIME_VALUE, DATETIME_VALUE, BYTES_VALUE FROM TB_TEST_DATA_TYPE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TEST_DATA_TYPE ( STRING_VALUE, INT_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, DOUBLE_VALUE, BIG_DECIMAL_VALUE, DATE_VALUE, DATETIME_VALUE, TIME_VALUE, BYTES_VALUE ) VALUES ( #{stringValue}, #{intValue}, #{booleanValue}, #{longValue}, #{floatValue}, #{doubleValue}, #{bigDecimalValue}, #{dateValue}, #{dateTimeValue}, #{timeValue}, #{bytesValue} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TEST_DATA_TYPE SET STRING_VALUE = #{stringValue}, INT_VALUE = #{intValue}, BOOLEAN_VALUE = #{booleanValue}, LONG_VALUE = #{longValue}, FLOAT_VALUE = #{floatValue}, DOUBLE_VALUE = #{doubleValue}, BIG_DECIMAL_VALUE = #{bigDecimalValue}, DATE_VALUE = #{dateValue}, DATETIME_VALUE = #{dateTimeValue}, TIME_VALUE = #{timeValue}, BYTES_VALUE = #{bytesValue} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TEST_DATA_TYPE ( STRING_VALUE, INT_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, LONG_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, DOUBLE_VALUE, BIG_DECIMAL_VALUE, DATE_VALUE, TIME_VALUE, DATETIME_VALUE, BYTES_VALUE ) VALUES ( #{stringValue}, #{intValue}, #{booleanValue}, #{longValue}, #{floatValue}, #{doubleValue}, #{bigDecimalValue}, #{dateValue}, #{timeValue}, #{dateTimeValue}, #{bytesValue} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TEST_DATA_TYPE SET STRING_VALUE = #{stringValue}, INT_VALUE = #{intValue}, BOOLEAN_VALUE = #{booleanValue}, LONG_VALUE = #{longValue}, FLOAT_VALUE = #{floatValue}, DOUBLE_VALUE = #{doubleValue}, BIG_DECIMAL_VALUE = #{bigDecimalValue}, DATE_VALUE = #{dateValue}, DATETIME_VALUE = #{dateTimeValue}, TIME_VALUE = #{timeValue}, BYTES_VALUE = #{bytesValue} WHERE ID = #{id}
